subject: Sexual Health
title: Blue Balls Explained
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Blue Balls Explained.

hook.text: Blue balls is real as a mild discomfort but has been wildly exaggerated as a manipulation tactic.

buildup.text: Epididymal hypertension occurs when arousal increases blood flow to the genitals without orgasmic release.

discovery.text: The result can be a dull ache in the testicles that resolves on its own within minutes to an hour.

twist.text: It is never dangerous and never requires another person to resolve. It has been used to coerce partners unfairly.

climax.text: Understanding the real science separates legitimate biology from manipulative pressure tactics.

punchline.text: Mildly uncomfortable, never dangerous, never an excuse.

quiz.question: Is blue balls medically dangerous?
options: No, it resolves on its own and is never dangerous
